name: ChangeFont19
description: Changes Font 19 in Geometry Dash to the official Minecraft font.

fontStyle.name: Font Style
fontStyle.description:
Set a particular font style for Font 19. <cy>(This option will not apply to Item Counter objects, which fall back to the</c> <cf>Classic</c> <cy>font style.)</c>

Go ahead and <cr>e</c><co>x</c><cs>p</c><cc>e</c><cy>r</c><cg>i</c><cj>m</c><cl>e</c><cb>n</c><ca>t</c>!

issues.info: In case this mod fails to apply the texture pack correctly, please install Uproxide's Texture Workshop mod and download ChangeFont19 from there.
